## hammingDist variable

Returns number of bit changes between `x` and `y`<!-- -->.

[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hamming\_distance](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hamming_distance)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
hammingDist: (x: number, y: number) => number
```
